Package appeng.api.util

Interface IBlockEntityDrops

public interface IBlockEntityDrops

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    getDrops(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, List<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack> drops)
    implemented on AE's block entities, Gets a list of drops that the entity will normally drop, this doesn't include the block itself.

  • Method Details

    • getDrops

      void getDrops(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, List<net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack> drops)
      implemented on AE's block entities, Gets a list of drops that the entity will normally drop, this doesn't include the block itself.
      Parameters:
      level - level of block entity
      pos - location of the block
      drops - drops of block entity
